title: ﻿क्या कुवैत में इस गायक ने सुषमा स्वराज के सामने राम मंदिर निर्माण का गीत गाया ?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: #WATCH: Kuwaiti singer Mubarak Al-Rashid sings the favourite bhajan of Mahatma Gandhi `Vaishnav Jan to Tene Kahiye’ during an event in Kuwait, in the presence of EAM Sushma Swaraj. pic.twitter.com/aKqy1HM2hn
